data.name: Coin
data.description: The primary currency of Tyria. Spent at vendors throughout the world.

data.name: Karma
data.description: Earned through various activities. Spent at vendors throughout the world.

data.name: Laurel
data.description: Earned through the Log-in Reward Chest. Spent in major cities. Used to purchase various rewards.

data.name: Gem
data.description: Purchased and spent via the Black Lion Trading Company.

data.name: Ascalonian Tear
data.description: Earned in Ascalonian Catacombs. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Ascalon" component used in creating legendary weapons.

data.name: Shard of Zhaitan
data.description: Earned in the Ruined City of Arah. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Zhaitan" component used in creating legendary weapons.

data.name: Fractal Relic
data.description: Earned and spent in Fractals of the Mists. Also used as a crafting ingredient.

data.name: Seal of Beetletun
data.description: Earned in Caudecus's Manor. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Nobleman" component used in creating legendary weapons.

data.name: Flame Legion Charr Carving
data.description: Earned in Citadel of Flame. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Baelfire" component used in creating legendary weapons.

data.name: Knowledge Crystal
data.description: Earned in Crucible of Eternity. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Knowledge" component used in creating legendary weapons.

data.name: Badge of Honor
data.description: Earned and spent in WvW to purchase various items.

data.name: Guild Commendation
data.description: Earned through Guild Missions. Spent in Lion's Arch. Used to purchase various rewards.

data.name: Transmutation Charge
data.description: Purchased via the Black Lion Trading Company. Spent in the wardrobe to change appearance.

data.name: Airship Part
data.description: Earned and spent in Verdant Brink. Train the Itzel Language Mastery ability to trade with Itzel vendors for bladed armor and other goods.

data.name: Lump of Aurillium
data.description: Earned and spent in Auric Basin. Train the Exalted Acceptance Mastery line to trade with Exalted merchants for auric weapon recipes and other goods.

data.name: Spirit Shard
data.description: Used by Miyani to maintain the Mystic Forge.

data.name: Pristine Fractal Relic
data.description: Earned and spent in the Fractals of the Mists. Used to purchase ascended rings.

data.name: Geode
data.description:
Earned by completing events in Dry Top. Accepted by vendors throughout the area.
Can be traded for valuable items including recipes for foods, Nomad's gear, and ambrite weapons.

data.name: Bandit Crest
data.description:
Earned by completing events in the Silverwastes. Accepted by vendors in Camp Resolve and at secured outposts.
Can be traded for valuable items including Carapace armor and recipes for sinister gear.

data.name: Trade Contract
data.description: Earned in the Crystal Desert. Spend at karma merchants to purchase trade crates with crafting materials, new crafting recipes, and other rewards unique to the Crystal Desert.

data.name: Elegy Mosaic
data.description:
Earned by completing legendary bounties in the Crystal Desert. Spend at the Tomb of Primeval Kings.

<c=@Flavor>These markers were used to commemorate great deeds in the Dynastic Era of ancient Elona.</c>
